entry.title: $1900 // Beautiful Modern 2 Br Apartment
entry.content:
* Beautiful 2BR/1BA modern condo in Woodside
* 3-minute walk to E/F/7/M/R trains and buses
* 12 minutes from Manhattan by subway
* Convenient to laundry, shopping, restaurants etc.
* Hardwood floor, granite countertop, stainless steel appliances
* Double pane / Storm windows
* Forced air gas heat
* Air conditioning
* Cable-ready
* Intercom system
* $1900 rent includes hot and cold water
* Security deposit - one month rent
* Thorough credit and income checks
* Email with full name and phone number
* No smoking
* No pets
* No broker
